short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Alfred adds an AI's opinion to every web search you make.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Alfred adds an AI's opinion to every web search you make. Alfred uses GPT-3, the best Artificial Intelligence in the world to give it's opinion on the answer. This extension is helpful to help refine your google search, ask more generic questions without having to click on a link, and just to have fun!
